Articles.Content: Will the WIPs include GIANTENEMYCRAB vs. Freya...for the lulz?
...What? I don't even...
How would they kill it? With what guns? But that would inevitably cause problems in the trip to Laythe.

How would they kill it? With what guns? But that would inevitably cause problems in the trip to Laythe.

A giant cooking pot?
Giant crab stew?
I presume that the water for it would come from the ocean but what about all the spices? And you would need three bowls and a ladle for the soup.
Three bowls and a ladle? That sounds like three satellite dishes and half a monoprop tank stuck on the end of a radio antenna to me.

What about the spices? I'm not a expert when it comes to extra-terrestrial giant crab soup but I think some spices would be needed. Would that be the monopropellant for the spices with a dash of liquid oxygen?

You know, i've been wanting to say this for a while. but wasn't sure how to put it.

I kind of like the forums more before we had all these great artists sucking up most the attention of the forum people.

No offense to anyone that is running one of those artwork mega-threads, i just kind of find them... annoying. (i guess)

This is nothing against chobbit, PFL, or any other artist here. i'm just saying what i've been trying not to say for a few months now.

there should be water that is hard to distinguish from ice so this happens

and where else am i gonna get heard other than one of the threads itself.

Now, i'm not gonna start some argument over what i think.

also upon looking at the fan art forum out of 50 results i see 3 mega art threads

@rewdew most of the attention of the whole Forum not really. You could say the same thing about all the modders.

I'm not gonna go all out on the modders because the purpose of the addons section is to present your addons.

The purpose of the fan-works area is to look at everyone's fanart/videos/ETC. not just looking at 2 or 3 threads then being done for the day.

I was thinking Xenon. What with its cool-sounding name, it must be delicious!

You can use the ion engine with it to slowly heat up the soup!

The radiation source in the RTG's also sounds tasty. Perhaps use both then?

I'm not gonna go all out on the modders because the purpose of the addons section is to present your addons.

The purpose of the fan-works area is to look at everyone's fanart/videos/ETC. not just looking at 2 or 3 threads then being done for the day.

See, originally, Chobit intended one or two pics. Somehow, it evolved, I got pulled in to write, and now we use the thread to keep in touch with friends and fans, and reassure them that progress is taking place. I don't know about other large threads, but I wouldn't be surprised if it was the same for them.

Personally, I like it when a creator keeps in touch with the fanbase. It reassures the fans that progress is being made and they aren't longing after a dead!fic/storyline, and it motivates the creator (in this case, creators) to keep working, because they don't want to dissapoint the fans who may have become friends.

To conclude, if you don't like the mega-threads, don't enter them. Problem solved.

You can use the ion engine with it to slowly heat up the soup!

The radiation source in the RTG's also sounds tasty. Perhaps use both then?

Ion-heated giant space crab soup, seasoned with xenon and blutonium? Genius!

To conclude, if you don't like the mega-threads, don't enter them. Problem solved.

I honestly have no idea.

In all seriousness though, there will be no cooking of giant crabs in the official art. This is Postcards from Laythe, not Deadliest Catch ;P
